Who was the Minister of Agriculture during the government of Bohuslav Sobotka?
all_questions.context: When Marian Jurečka was Minster of Agriculture, Lukáš Jurečka served as his advisor.

all_questions.question: What position did Lukáš Jurečka hold in the Pooslaví cooperative from 2 February 2010 to 28 June 2021?
all_questions.context: Previously, he was actively involved in the management of the cooperative as a member of the board of directors and later as its vice-chairman.

all_questions.question: What was Lukáš Jurečka's role at the Pooslaví cooperative?
all_questions.context: In the past, for example, half a million subsidies for the cooperative were laundered on the project of demonstration farms, which was a new subsidy project introduced under Marian Jurečka. Minister Jurečka's brother Lukáš Jurečka is the director of the cooperative and in the past he served as a member of the board of directors and later as vice-chairman of the board of directors.
